DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to determine if 5 mg amlodipine 3rd Orally-Disintegrating (OD) tablet (new formulation) and 5 mg amlodipine 2nd OD tablet (commercial formulation) are bioequivalent.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study For 5 Mg Amlodipine Orally-Disintegrating Tablet
DOC.criteria: Healthy; Body Mass Index (BMI) of 18 to 28 kg/m2; total body weight within the range of 50 to 100 kg History of regular alcohol consumption exceeding 14 drinks/week Use of tobacco or nicotinecontaining products in excess of the equivalent of 10 cigarettes per day
